TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`4<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4)
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4);

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第三個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T4
typeparam.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的第四個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the fourth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg1
param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數。

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg2
param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數。

span.span: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg3
param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第三個參數。

span.span: The third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg4
param.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的第四個參數。

span.span: The fourth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封裝具有 4 個參數且沒有傳回值的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has four parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用要做為參數傳遞給方法，而不必明確宣告自訂委派的委派。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應至這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有所有傳遞給它的值，四個參數，而且必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have four parameters that are all passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. (在 C# 中，此方法必須傳回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必須定義的`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 建構。construct. 它也可以傳回值，則會忽略這個值的方法。）通常，這種方法用來執行作業。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考的方法有四個參數並傳回值，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has four parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 當您使用委派，您不需要明確定義這個委派會封裝具有 4 個參數的方法。When you use the delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with four parameters. 例如，下列程式碼明確宣告委派，名為`StringCopy`和指派參考`CopyStrings`其委派執行個體的方法。For example, the following code explicitly declares a delegate named `StringCopy` and assigns a reference to the `CopyStrings` method to its delegate instance. [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Delegate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Action~4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/vb/Delegate.vb#1)] 下列範例會具現化來簡化此程式碼而不是明確地定義新的委派，並為其指派具名的方法的委派。The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it. [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Action4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Action~4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/vb/Action4.vb#2)] 您也可以使用委派與 C# 中的匿名方法，如下列範例所示。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates. (如匿名方法的簡介，請參閱[匿名方法](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md)。)(For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Anon.cs#3)] 您也可以指派 lambda 運算式給委派執行個體，如下列範例所示。You can also assign a lambda expression to an delegate instance, as the following example illustrates. (如需 lambda 運算式的簡介，請參閱[Lambda 運算式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md)。)(For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~4#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/cs/Lambda.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Action~4#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~4/vb/lambda.vb#4)]
